intro: Praravinia oresitropha, commonly known as the slender sandwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Montiaceae. It is a low-growing perennial herb that typically reaches a height of about 10 centimeters. The plant features small, clustered flowers that are usually pink or white in color. It thrives in sandy or gravelly soils and is often found in arid or semi-arid environments. Praravinia oresitropha is native to regions of southern Africa, particularly Namibia and South Africa.
